CHAPTER 1250 Specifications for Documents Submitted

CROSS REFERENCES

General improvements, street and subdivision names – see P. & Z. 1248.01(e)

Minimum standards for boundary surveys, monumentation – see Ohio R.C. 4733.37.03

General improvements, monuments – see P. & Z. 1248.01(c)
